Question 130) The Kidney Project is a project by scientists who want to develop a bionic kidney that will perform most of the organ's biological functions. The bionic kidney will have two parts that incorporate recent advances in nanotechnology, membrane filtration and cell biology. This project will mean a great improvement in quality of life for those people who depend on hemodialysis for survival.
The created device will directly promote the
A) Urea removal.
B) Excretion of lipids.
C) vasopressin synthesis.
D) ammonia transformation.
E) manufacture of aldosterone.
